channel.title: Razer Surround pro
channel.description:
Hello there ;)
Yesterday i got an e-mail from Razer, saying that Razer Surround Pro is free for some time.And i downloaded it even though my whole set is Steelseries.
Whenever i installed it,and gave it a try;it really improves the sound you hear.And Its both useful on Music and Games that are related with Sound (Like CS:GO or CoD )
Here is the link for it.# [url=http://goo.gl/2EGwQ2]http://goo.gl/2EGwQ2[/url]
Regards DivineX

item.title: Razer Surround pro
